message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your offer was a bit unfair to me.  I'm willing to be reasonable, but I need a larger share to agree. This is my counter-offer.
I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers. This is as fair as it gets!
Time is running out Alice, and the value of this deal is shrinking for you. I'm offering a compromise that's still beneficial for both of us. Let's close this deal.
